snippet.title: Reel Fishing Paradise 3DS - OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Travel to over a dozen stunning fishing locales in your quest to become a master angler.

Fish in tranquil lakes, rocky coastal waters, flooded forests, and more, all rendered in eye-popping 3D that brings every leaping fish and splash of water to life.

A huge variety of fish will test the expertise of even the most seasoned fishing veterans, from wily largemouth bass to powerful bluefin tuna.

Mix-and-match rods, reels, lines, lures or bait to create your own personalised tackle box — collecting rare items is both advantageous and addictive, with tons of gear to discover and use.

With so much to see and do, Reel Fishing Paradise 3D is a game guaranteed to draw you into its depths!

+15 Stages, 40 Fish, and over 100 pieces of tackle!

+A variety of fishing techniques, from bait fishing to fly!

+Catch, keep, and care for fish in two fully customisable 3D fish tanks!
